articles.title: New blood pressure guidelines by American Heart Association: Key takeaways - The Times of India
articles.description: AHA/ACC release new blood pressure guideline
articles.content: Adults should limit sodium to 2,300 mg daily, ideally 1,500 mg, following a heart-healthy plan like DASH with fruits, vegetables, whole grains, lean proteins, and healthy oils. Reduce alcoholless or … [+48 chars]
